body.bibl: Treiger, Alexander. “Palestinian Origenism and the Early History of the Maronites: In Search of the Origins of the Arabic Theology of Aristotle.” In Ideas in Motion in Baghdad and Beyond: Philosophical and Theological Exchanges between Christians and Muslims in the Third/Ninth and Fourth/Tenth Centuries, edited by Damien Janos, 44–80.
